benchmark_details.name: LebEval (Lebanese Evaluation Dataset)
benchmark_details.overview: LebEval is a new benchmark derived from native Lebanese content, aiming to address the limitations of existing benchmarks that rely on translated materials, specifically focused on the translation of the low-resource Lebanese dialect.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To establish a more reliable evaluation framework for dialectal translation using culturally-aware datasets that better reflect the linguistic and cultural nuances of the Lebanese dialect.

data.source: The dataset includes authentic Lebanese content sourced from podcasts.

methodology.interpretation: Higher xCOMET scores indicate better translation quality correlating with human judgment.
methodology.validation: This benchmark was validated using human evaluations and its performance was compared against the FLoRes benchmark.
